1.0.0-rc.changes: Improved stability, final settings for ftp client, and ability to manually add consoles. can change default jb port but must force restart the app. Can select how you want to upload the payload.

1.0.0-beta.changes: Improved stability, included ftp for browsing, uploading and deleting files

1.0.0-alpha.1.changes: Added proguard rules for production build to fix minor error upon compilation. Delay payload execution from server side. Makes sending payload a bit more stable.
